00056 EagleBoolean EagleDbSqlCastExpression_GetOperation(EagleDataType left,
00057                                                    EagleDataType right,
00058                                                    EagleDbSqlCastOperator *match)
00059 {
00060     unsigned long i;
00061     static EagleDbSqlCastOperator ops[] = {
00062         { EagleDataTypeInteger, EagleDataTypeFloat, EaglePageOperations_CastPageIntFloat }
00063     };
00064     
00065     for(i = 0; i < sizeof(ops) / sizeof(EagleDbSqlCastOperator); ++i) {
00066         if(left == ops[i].left && right == ops[i].right) {
00067             *match = ops[i];
00068             return EagleTrue;
00069         }
00070     }
00071     
00072     return EagleFalse;
00073 }
